Writing this review after 1 year of usage. Phone is average in this price
range. it hangs sometime and touch is also not that responsive as others in
this segment. The major issue for this rating is that battery is swollen after
1 year of usage. In fact, I purchased 2 On5 Pro mobiles at the same time and
battery is swollen for both of them. This shows the poor quality of battery...

Cute. Weightless. Fits well in shirt pocket without a feel of weight. Awesome
product.

Worth for the money. I got this Product as exchange for my Samsung Mobile. I
paid extra 2100 bugs. My Dad uses this 4G Mobile. He is pretty much okay with
it. Touch sensitivity is a bit slow but this is what a 7000 rs range mobile
can give u. Appearance and Display is worth the money. Instead of getting
other brand mobiles you can go with this Budget Samsung Mobile which is good
quality product

Good phone at 7.5k. Saw a lot of negative reviews on amazon. But I have not

decent. Would have given full marks if fast charging option was there.

Phone delivery on right time. Touchscreen is smooth. Screen is bright and

Very Nice phone. Bought it for my Aunt. Light to hold. Fits in her palm. The
rose Gold gives it an elegent look. Good internal storage. Camera quality is
nice, front & back. Battery charge stays long, but constant internet usage
makes it deteriorate faster than normal.

A good budget phone. Using for last 3 months without any software problem.
Rear camera is pretty good but Selfie camera is okay type. The battery back-up
is not so impressive. If you have a power-bank then On5 Pro could be your
choice.  
  
Overall I am satisfied with this phone. It has an elegant look, so that you
can keep it on your palm without any hesitation.

In my openion  
I will strongly recomemded to buy it at this price.  
I am fully satisfied with this product.

October. Only thing which I feel missing is the gorilla glass screen.

I have been using this phone for over a month. Its a good reliable phone from
samsung.  
Ram, Camera, Memory, Battery backup etc evrything is fine. No hanging problem.
Smooth response and with Android 6 u can restrict permissions of different
apps to only portions u want them to access.  
Only thing lacking is a flash in front camera. Bt overall at under 7.5 k i
think it is a very good and safe option to go by if u want durability along
with decent specifications.

review:
Its a brilliant phone, except its Camera, but still....  
Specs are good...  
I got 500 cashbackk so technically phone is on same price with 4A.  
  
Pros-  
Processor and RAM are working as expected.  
No heating issues.  
No hanging issues (Not used as pro. Gamer, but for Normal operations)  
Dual SIM with Dedicated Memory Card Slot (No hybrid bull****).  
  
Cons-  
Battery backup is small. (But battery is not draining much on standby.)  
Charger is 5V 1A. (Should be 2A for fast charging).  
  
Overall, build quality is better than China.

Great phone under Rs.10000. I got my phone around 6 months before through
amazon. Good battery back-up. Smooth performance with multitasking. No lags
till now. I am not a full time gamer. But i could run games such as sniper
assassin smoothly without any lag. No heating problems till now. It would be
great to have a slight improvement over the camera and build quality. I would
recommend this to anyone who wishes to buy a smartphone under Rs.10000.  
I have had this for 6Samsung On5 Pro (Gold) months or so now. and last week my
battery started getting fat. but no problems. now it just shut downs at 20
percent or 30 percent. and reboots.

Its an excellent phone. And the price is soooooooo in-budget... I am really
happy...  
Although a little sluggish, but within this price all the features are
sooooooo great.... I am HAPPY....... :D

Excellent budget product from Samsung. I gifted it to my father and he loved
it. Reasonable internal memory (16GB) and RAM (2GB). Camera quality is average
overall but can be called good for the price point. Struggles to take good
pictures without flash in poor lighting conditions. Otherwise very good.
Overall a good budget smartphone.

Gifted it to my Father in Law and he finds the features simple and easy to
use. A basic smartphone appropriate for anyone looking in this budget range.
